title: Welcome to Wine: An Illustrated Guide to All You Really Need to Know
description: From food pairings to the art of wine tasting, this charmingly illustrated guide makes the world of wine more welcoming than ever!Calling all wine newbies and wine This illustrated guide is refreshing as a rosé and flavorful as a merlot. Growing up in a family that's been in the wine business for five generations, Madelyne Meyer would be the first to tell you, you don’t need a book to enjoy wine . . . but knowing more about your favorite glassful can be a pleasure all its own.In Welcome to Wine, Meyer pairs her expert knowledge with 200 witty, whimsical illustrations that make all the essentials crystal clear—so you can get to the good part sooner! From choosing wine fora date night to training your nose to pickup “notes,” this is the friendliest guide to wine.
author: Madelyne Meyer
